definition: to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops

containing_words.word: 北京汽車製造廠有限公司

sentences.english: Never buy animals from puppy mills or pet stores.
sentences.chinese: 不要從那些小動物製造廠或寵物商店買小動物。

sentences.english: The almanac skin has the handbag factory for the domestic soleownership handbag manufacture enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 通勝皮具手袋製造廠爲國內獨資手袋製造企業。

sentences.english: Other solar panel manufacturers are also struggling in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 其他太陽能板製造廠也同樣在美國艱難的運營。

sentences.english: So it covers a story in a beading factory in China.
sentences.chinese: 它講述了一個發生在中國的一個輪胎製造廠的故事。

sentences.english: Year manufactured products, code-named factory should be in accordance with the provisions of the design department.
sentences.chinese: 製造年分代號應符合製造廠產品設計部門的規定。

sentences.english: Tang said he had retired from Chongqing Bus Producing Factory.
sentences.chinese: 唐是重慶汽車製造廠的退休工人。

sentences.english: After the mill closes,the local economy may tailspin.
sentences.chinese: 製造廠關閉後，當地經濟可能突然陷於困境。

sentences.english: Shenzhen Fuxing manufacturer of electric vehicles is a strong local enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 深圳市福星電動車製造廠是一家實力雄厚的本地企業。

sentences.english: You can then submit the orders to the manufacturing plants for fulfillment.
sentences.chinese: 然後您可以提交這些訂單給製造廠進行生產。

sentences.english: MORIS Italia S. r. l. is professional producer of hydraulic equipment.
sentences.chinese: 意大利摩瑞斯公司是一家專業的液壓設備製造廠商。

sentences.english: Technology was transferred from the USA to a manufacturer in India.
sentences.chinese: 美國向一家印度製造廠轉讓了技術。

sentences.english: We would be pleased to accompany you to our manufacturing plant.
sentences.chinese: 我們很樂間陪同你們參觀我們的製造廠家。

sentences.english: He also opened the first syrup manufacturing plant in 1884.
sentences.chinese: 他還開設了第一糖漿製造廠於1884年。

sentences.english: The changes buffeting low-end manufacturers are likely to be long-lasting.
sentences.chinese: 衝擊低端製造廠商的這些變化很可能會是長期的。

sentences.english: This metal ware factory has introduced a new water press to increase production.
sentences.chinese: 皿製造廠新引進了一臺水壓機，以擴大生產。

sentences.english: The manufacturers guarantee the watch for three years.
sentences.chinese: 製造廠商對這種手錶保用三年。
